setting.location: Warsaw train station platform, Congress Poland, iron and glass railway terminal connecting to Russian Empire network

characters.appearance: Man in early 40s, dark hair now showing grey, face showing hard-won peace
characters.clothing: Travel coat and hat, simple but quality attire
characters.position: Standing on platform with single suitcase
characters.action: Looking down the tracks toward departing direction

characters.appearance: Elderly clerk in his 60s, tears in eyes, trembling hands
characters.action: Gripping the younger man's hand in farewell

characters.appearance: Young scientist in late 20s, supportive expression

scene.mainElements: Train platform with steam locomotive ready to depart, emotional farewell between old clerk and merchant, scientist accompanying on journey, new chapter beginning
scene.details: Black locomotive releasing steam, iron and glass station architecture, gas lamps still lit in morning mist, other travelers with luggage, conductor with whistle, pigeons on rafters, puddles reflecting the scene, worn wooden platform, luggage carts, farewell flowers dropped on platform, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Warsaw cityscape visible through station arches, church spires in mist, industrial buildings
scene.atmosphere: Bittersweet departure, ending and beginning, loyalty transcending ruin, hope for redemption through exile

composition.cameraAngle: Platform level showing the three men and waiting train
composition.focus: The emotional farewell between devoted clerk and departing merchant
composition.depth: Farewell group in foreground, train in middle ground, misty city in background
